name: Adept
desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

name: Assassin
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.
stats: +25% Critical Strike Damage & +10% Critical Strike Chance
+55% Critical Strike Damage & +30% Critical Strike Chance
+90% Critical Strike Damage & +50% Critical Strike Chance

name: Brawler
desc: Brawlers gain bonus Health and Attack Damage

name: Dragonsoul
desc: The first Dragonsoul allies to take damage in combat receives the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 40% of the target's maximum Health in magic damage. On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

name: Elderwood
desc: Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.
stats: 15 Armor and MR, 5 AD and SP
20 Armor and MR, 10 AD and SP
30 Armor and MR, 15 AD and SP

name: Executioner
desc: Executioner attacks and spells always critically hit targets below a certain percent threshold of health.

name: Exile
desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:
stats: A shield equal to 50% of their maximum health

name: Fabled
stats: Fabled champion's spells are empowered from tales of their past valor.

name: Mage
desc: Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

name: Ninja
desc: Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

name: Sharpshooter
desc: Sharpshooters' attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies, dealing reduced damage.

name: Spirit
desc: The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed.

name: Syphoner
desc: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

name: Vanguard
desc: Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor and Magic Resist
